sentences: Born in Schaffhausen, Hess studied at the conservatory of Zurich from 1932 and 1934, and then at the Ecole Normale de Musique de Paris, with Paul Dukas and Nadia Boulanger among others.
From 1935 he worked in Switzerland as conductor of several choirs and orchestras.
In 1938, he was appointed lecturer of music theory at the conservatory of Winterthur.
From 1956, he taught musicology at the University of Zurich.
